name: Shadow Sniper
description:
Stuck in a dark, fog covered forest you're surrounded on all sides by enemies who will stop at nothing to make sure you don't make it out alive. A suppressed sniper by your side and nothing else but your skill and wit you must take out each enemy to win the game and progress to the next stage.

Battle through 5 different levels, each increasing in difficulty. Do you have what it takes to beat the final level?

Download and extract the .zip file and run the "Shadow Sniper.exe" file to play. Don't move or remove any of the other files.
